SUMMIT  
UNIKINGS  
VARITAS  
WESLEYUNI  
WESTERN-DEL  
  
  
FINANCE  
NOVENA  
  
TAXATION  
NASARAWA  
  
OFFICE AND INFORMATION  
 MANAGEMENT    
NDU  
   (ii) UNIOSUN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics and Economics are compulsory with  
'O' level credit passes in at least two (2) other subjects from 
Geography, Government, Accounts and Book -Keeping at 
one sitting.  
(iii) BELLS, EBSU and REDEEMERS same as in Accountancy.  
(iv) GOUU and WESTERN-DEL same as in Accounting  
(v) NDU  
a. Banking, Finance and Insur ance require five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any 
two (2) of the following; Accounting, Business  
 Methods,  Commerce,  Government,  Geography  and  
Statistics  
b. Office Management Technology requires five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, Economics, and three (3) other 
subjects.  
(vi) LASU requires two (2) other subjects from Principles of 
Account, Commerce and Office Practice.  
(vii) RHEMA accepts ND in Bankin g and Finance, Business 
Administration, Accounting, Financial Studies, Agricultural 
Economics or NCE in Economics/Business Studies with the 
UTME requirements.  
(viii) CUAB requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any two (2) of the 
following: Commerce,   Geography and Statistics.  
(ix) FUNAAB requires two (2) 'O' level credit passes from any of 
Principles  of Account, Commerce, Government or 
Geography.  
(x) SOUTHWESTERN for Business Administration requires two 
(2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, 
Government, Geography, and Statistics as other relevant 
subjects.  
(xi) UNIKINGS - Same as in Accounting  
(xii) CHRISTOPHER requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics, one (1) Science 
subject and any one of Accounting, Business Methods, 
Commerce, Government, Geography or Statistics.  
(xiii) BELLS require five (5) 'O' Level credit passes at one or two (2) 
sittings which must include E nglish Language, Mathematics, 
Economics and any other two (2) subjects.
